d2_dictionary.title: Provides a list of primary groups defined in the GMP Artifacts inventory.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
d2_dictionary.dql: select distinct d1.alias_value as name from dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_alias_view d1, dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_alias_view d2 where d1.dictionary_name = 'GMP Artifacts Classification by Groups and Subgroups' and d1.dictionary_name = d2.dictionary_name and d1.dictionary_key = d2.dictionary_key and d1.alias_name = 'GMP Groups' and (d2.alias_name='Artifact Label' and (d2.alias_value not like 'DHF%' and d2.alias_value not like 'DMR%')) order by 1
